website_summaries.verdict: This tablet has a range of impressive features that makes it an appealing buy for anyone looking for a tablet for daily use.
pros: Built in stand makes watching movies and shows a breeze
8-inch screen offers impressive resolution, delivering clear images
cons: Due to its placement, power button is easy to hit by accident

customer_reviews.title: Stopped charging
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my aging Samsung Galaxy Tab Pro 10.1. Initially I enjoyed the tablet and its unique features but after a little more than one year it stopped charging. Since it was out of warranty I took it to a local repair outfit. They tried replacing the USB port and the battery plus a factory reset but nothing worked and it still won't charge beyond about 11% and plugging it in loses charge too fast to keep it operating. Guess I have an expensive paper weight.
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: This is a BAD PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This product is a piece of crap. After 4 months it will not hold a charge. After returning it from Lenovo for repairs it still will not hold a charge. Cannot get the tablet to charge more than 32% I called Lenovo support and got no where with my problem
customer_reviews.author: Mt Gregory

customer_reviews.title: 3 months of use and now it’s dead.
customer_reviews.text: Bought back in January 8. Today it stopped working. Does not charge, does not turn on. Dead. I expect an answer from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: feplazas

customer_reviews.title: Lenovo Yoga Tab 3 Proj QHD Android PICO projector
customer_reviews.text: Not even Apple has something like this! This is my 2nd Android tablet that has a very good projector built in. Lenovo quallity, very good construction. I take images/videos with it and then project it 5-6feet from myself onto a wall, with images approximately 5feet wide. When you rotate the kickstand up, it reveals a PICO projector. There is a manual zoom. Sound quality is good.Great for watching streaming movies like Star Trek, Star Wars, etc. I also use a BT speaker so that everybody can hear. RECOMMEND: Makes a great gift. I purchased a couple already.
customer_reviews.author: Allen NakagawaTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Received two lemons - update installation hangs or completes but device turns on w/o display. Others say you can plug into TV or other monitor and touchpad works but that aint the point of getting a tab. I loved the design, the curvy end to hold, front facing speakers and all. But unreliable.
customer_reviews.author: Quilter

customer_reviews.title: Glorified ebook reader
customer_reviews.text: Decent battery life, but that doesn't justify how heavy this thing is. You could wield it as a weapon if you needed to. It's like an 8" tablet with a solid steel flashlight strapped to one side. The performance is abysmal and it won't play videos using modern encoding because the software is so old. Most videos on websites just give an "unexpected error." The screen lags bad and even the most casual of games struggle. Basically of you want to do more than use it as an e-reader you will be disappointed. Even then the page turn animation in Google Play Books lags. It's only saving grace is it's solidly built and cheap.
customer_reviews.author: ItsMeReally

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Yoga to try vs my iPad mini. Pros: Unbelievable sound thanks to Dolby Atmos. Screen very sharp and at least as clear and bright as Ipad. The built-in stand is very nice and makes holding it easier. After putting in a 128GB SD card it added that to the 16 GB storage! Creating a single hard drive. Cons: Definitely needs a power boost. With several apps open it really drags. All and all I'll keep it for it's music and sound value and for $139 you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: RMigs

customer_reviews.title: lenova yoga 3 tablets freezes youtube often
customer_reviews.text: sound is good.But it is awkard to hold it. Then frame freezing on playing youtube. everytime you have to reboot it. Lenova makes bad undependable products.Only reason I bought it as it 100% android based. and my karaoke software meragana.com plays on it. If I could have played it on amazon tablet. I would have kept my amazon tablet. bad low sound is another back draw on Amazon tablets . actually all tablets sound is bad u can barly hear song , if you are 3 feet from these tablets. I don't know why tablet makers/designers don't make tablets with good reasonable sound voulume.
customer_reviews.author: prakash deshmukh

customer_reviews.title: Don't get me wrong the tablet works great. However
customer_reviews.text: Don't get me wrong the tablet works great. However, make sure to never have the need to send it to their god awful support team. It has been over a month now for me to try and get the screen fixed (me paying for the replacement not expecting some sort of warranty) and still I have heard nothing from them. Now they have my tablet, and I keep waiting for a phone call from the repair team just to initiate the repairs, which they still haven't called after the 5th time trying to get a response. I highly recommend you get the best screen protector / case as the glass is extremely fragile and will break relatively easy.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: The Swiss army knife of tablets. And it can hang, literally.
customer_reviews.text: If you are not familiar with this product you will fall in love with the metal kickstand. The kickstand makes this thing so versatile I like it more than all of my other devices combined times two.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Heärd

customer_reviews.title: Would be a nice tablet, if not for several issues.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this tablet for several months and have been thoroughly disappointed with it. I purchased to use in my shop, but soon found out that you cannot use the bluetooth and the wifi simultaneously. If you try the wifi drops out immediately. That is a HUGE problem if you like to stream music or videos. The other problem I noticed is that within a month the headphone jack quit working. I love the shape, built in kickstand, and long battery life but the wifi problem is a deal breaker for me.
customer_reviews.author: a455olds

customer_reviews.title: On my 3rd replacement.
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT UPDATE TO YT-X703F_S000973_18054_ROW which is May 117MB. This will cause the Tablet to consume an extra 150-200 mah of battery when at idel. And to run the CPU from 1-3% (pre update) to 15-25% (post update). Experiencing slower performance. I contacted Lenovo about this and they blame Google. Which is total nonsense. Update came from them. Lenovo do not offer software support. The only fix for this, is to keep your tablet plugged in. Which for some reason makes CPU and power usage the same as it was before the update.
customer_reviews.author: Gamer

customer_reviews.title: my crappy ipad sucks
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS WHAT YOU WANT TO BUY. my crappy ipad sucks, my kindle cant play clash of clans. I love this damn tablet. long story long: I have an ipad and I bought a similar one for my wife. we game on them. they suck. I bought these tablets as a cheap replacement.they are the best. I highly recommend these tablets for gaming.
customer_reviews.author: BWrob

customer_reviews.title: Great design and features but poor execution
customer_reviews.text: I encountered poor display quality with the initial unit I purchased and a follow-up replacement. The first one I ordered had a dead pixel. The second one I ordered had a stuck pixel or pinhole in the display that allowed the backlight to clearly bleed through on dark backgrounds -- like the battery screen at first power-on. I'm not usually that particular when it comes to large displays but for a small screen that you interact with so closely, it's a dealbreaker.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Not even good for streaming.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this tablet, I really did. I absolutely loved the design of this tablet from day one. The soundbar and built in stand are just genius and I love the idea of them. They both work really well as well, I just wish the rest of the tablet did. Unfortunately the hardware just doesn't cut it anymore. I tried to stream off of the Showtime app but it just kept crashing. Streaming through other apps had a tendency to freeze and lag a lot. this is basically only good for very basic functionality and nothing beyond that. Don't bother getting it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet
customer_reviews.text: This is my second yoga tablet. It is phenomenal. Snappy performance. Excellent physical build. The only downside is that there are few accessories available. I am downgrading this review as of June 1. The power button has stopped working. A definite flaw in design. I press it and it does not pop out, resulting I endless rebooting. I had to use a screwdriver to pop the button out, and that resulted in the button falling of and it is unable to be reinstalled. The micross witch is now exposed. It is only a matter of time now until that fails. Shoddy.
customer_reviews.author: Paul S. Schatz

customer_reviews.title: A High Quality Tablet !
customer_reviews.text: I have had just over 72 hours to experience the initial value of this Leveno Yoga Tab 3 Plus QHD 10.1 inch Android tablet. It seemed fairly easy to set up and enjoy. The snapdragon 652 processor seemed quick to respond to normal web browsing. Am not a "gamer", so can not evaluate that aspect of operation. Screen settings give effortless viewing. Am getting around 16 hours of battery life before charging. The sound system is beyond "awesome". The front loaded speakers deliver amazing clarity of sound. Wished I would have purchased this tablet sooner. Will be "gifting" my two year old Samsung tablet to family member.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne P.

customer_reviews.title: Best. Media. Tablet. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: Best media consumption tablet I have ever owned. The price is totally worth it! You wont find better speakers on any other tablet. The screen is fantastic and the tablet has never lagged. Buy it before Lenovo stops making them. Wish they hadn't discontinued the Yoga line and focused on making Yoga 4 with a built in kickstand and an even bigger size maybe 12 inch. The Lenovo Tab 4 line with weaker processors and lower res screen can't even compare to the Yoga 3 10 Plus/Pro. Fyi the Nougat update is what made this tablet so much better. The only con would be that the screen isn't the most touch sensitive but the quality makes up for it.
customer_reviews.author: BluePrelude

customer_reviews.title: Having a tablet with a projector is very cool.
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this tablet. Everything works as expected and advertised. Pros: The projector is the coolest thing but for best quality I use a proper projector screen in a very dark room. Battery life is great, adjustable stand is stiff and useful, speed of tablet is good, expandable storage up to 128gb. Cons: This tablet has no newer replacement and runs Android Marshmallow. At the moment you can buy the tablet cheaper on Lenovo's web site but next day delivery from Amazon is worth the extra cost to me. Does not have USB Type-C only one Micro USB plug. No HDMI port. Screen is not gorilla glass.
customer_reviews.author: Numark

customer_reviews.title: Miserable wifi performance
customer_reviews.text: I'm having really bad performance on my home wifi network. Connection is slow and frequently drops out altogether. Other devices, including a 3 yr old Yoga 2 8" android tablet, continue to work with full speed 2.5Ghz and 5Ghz connections on the network. I've tried restarting the wifi, restarting the tablet, and restarting the router/access point. The problem persists. The tablet works fine on other wifi networks, including my cellphone as a hotspot. I'll try restoring factory settings, but if that doesn't work, I'm still in 30 day window so I will return it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Gold

customer_reviews.title: Seriously slow, it freezes with any application, wifi faulty. Please don't invest!!!
customer_reviews.text: When i first saw it i thought it was a very beautiful and premium tablet. but it is really slow it has so much software deficiencies. to keep it short even the dolby atmos demostration freezes the tablet to the point you have to reset it. a waste of money i'm really disappointment on Lenovo it is a shame. as you see the materials are premium, the picture is premium and the soun too, but the software is crap.
customer_reviews.author: julio felix

customer_reviews.title: The display processor is incredibly slow.
customer_reviews.text: I had a tablet that was 5 years old that I decided to replace due to the touchscreen becoming a little sketchy. I still use this Lenovo tablet, but I have been very disappointed how slow the graphics process. I do not do anything to extreme. Play a few games and watch youtube videos. It is not the internet speed, as other devices process the same video just fine. The video quality isn't bad it just lags during more active graphics. Will never buy Lenovo again.
customer_reviews.author: A. Callaway

customer_reviews.title: Best tablet under $300?
customer_reviews.text: I returned an ASUS ZenPad 3 10 due to mediocre battery life and falsely advertised quick-charging. Battery life is a big deal to me since my $400 Nexus 10 started to die in and a little over three years. And with a yellow stain in the screen it was not practical to try to replace the battery. Except for a slightly higher cost and little more bulk the Lenovo is superior in almost every way. 12/16/17 Update: Installed Android Nougat 7.1.1 update. A little late. I thought it would be available in October. But that's ok. Frosting on the cake of a terrific tablet.
customer_reviews.author: drifter yank

customer_reviews.title: I love the tab got them for my daughters and they ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the tab got them for my daughters and they loved it. The whole stand thing was a hit with them as they have the unusual habit of using it while laying on the floor or bed, they set the stand and stand on their head and watch it. Sound quality was very good can get pretty loud. the tab feels a bit metally, hard and heavy. I think that's due to the heavy battery inside of it. Only thing i would recommend anyone to get with this is a screen protector. Just to make sure that beautiful 8 inch glass doesn't get scratched or damaged
customer_reviews.author: Rishme Sheriff

customer_reviews.title: This is a high quality tablet.
customer_reviews.text: The Lenovo Tab 3 Pro is an excellent tablet with surprisingly high build quality. So far it has worked great, excellent for movies etc. The volume doesn't get really high, but is just fine. The fold out support is robust and works good. I just tried the projector feature today and I was surprised that it worked so good. I wouldn't push it past 3 or 4 feet but that provides a good screen size about 80 cm (very rich in the dark). The speakers are good if you want to use them. Overall I'm extremely happy with this mid-range tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Bad experience with Lenovo product.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my wife. And it is a bad experience with Lenovo product. This tablet has been ocasionally restarting from the first day when it was charging. I thought, okay this must be a problem of all high tech tablets of Lenovo. But it was really irritating when it began to restart while we were sleeping. So, it went to a kitchen to stop bothering us while it was charging. After 2 monthes of rare use the Lenovo tablet has turned down and doesn't turn on anymore. And as luck would have it the product support window has ended just 5 days ago. I do not reccomend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: Touchy, Ruins SD cards, Glitches!
customer_reviews.text: The really awesome thing are the Dolby Atmos front speakers!!! I don't know that such an option exists in an 8" tablet. BUT !!!! - it eats ALL memory cards and ruins them; go ahead, google reviews on this. Simply turning on & off is tetchy...(maybe I'm too old or impatient for the firestorm of constant tech learning curves these days???) If you want to watch quality vids on a fine system, I'd definitely search for something else if it's out there. Too f----g bad. The tab is schizo - it's great & it's horrible...I mean, WRECKING ALL SD CARDS??? Good luck with your 2 gigs of on-board memory! Grrrrrrrr
customer_reviews.author: phedup

customer_reviews.title: The Lenovo yoga tab 3 is great for general use and travel and gaming is pretty ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price I received this in early 2018 the other options I would have for around 130$ would sacrifice the form, reliable brand, and build quality. The Lenovo yoga tab 3 is great for general use and travel and gaming is pretty decent with titles like Kotor, Lego star wars, and Minecraft. The stand makes gaming simpler and geez the stand is strong. The screen is bright and sharp for the price. Also the best feature is the lack of bloatware and the support from Lenovo itself. For a general use streaming browsing and light gaming device the Lenovo yoga tab 3 8 inch literally cannot be beaten.
customer_reviews.author: emmanuel varela

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I know in late writing a review so sorry . I love love thus table!! Does more than i expected screen is fantastic and very bright colols..fast downloads and easy to use ..nice stereo sound ..long batterlife..im getting another one for a Christmas present this year...i wont buy another tablet but this one ..it does so much...and the seller got it to me on time with no problems.. looking for a new tablet get this one i promise you'll love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: cheryl pratt

customer_reviews.title: Love this Tablet! Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: My Lenovo Tab 3 - HD 8" updated to Android version 6.0.1 right away. Love this tablet. The picture is good, runs smooth. I'm glad I bought this one. Love the size, fits in my purse. I like the any pen feature also. Update: The battery life on this tablet is wonderful, I can get 2 days out of it. I've never had a tablet that the battery lasted that long. Also the speakers (wow) they sound really good for a tablet. I put the speakers on surround sound, and it definitely sounded like surround sound.
customer_reviews.author: Lana Ivette

customer_reviews.title: Best for the $$
customer_reviews.text: My second Yoga tablet. The batteries finally failed in the first one. The screen is very sharp with true colors. The sound is amazing for a tablet. The battery keeps it running twice as long as it's competition. I'm not a geek or a gamer, so I can't comment on specs or speed, but this tablet does everything I need. Before I discovered Lenovo Yoga tablets I owned an iPad which cost twice as much and ran half as long on a charge. I highly recommend these tablets!
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Eggleston

customer_reviews.title: I would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I really like this tablet. Wasn't sure what to expect at this price point but am very impressed with the picture and sound quality. It's not the fastest of tablets but it isn't 500 plus bucks and I'm not in that much of a hurry anyway. I have 10 inch tablets for heavy duty work but this I wanted just to watch videos and do lighter things like recipes and the like without having to haul around the larger gear. This works perfectly. Waited a few months before reviewing so as to be sure my review wasn't something I'd just change later... Perfect for light work and really nice for watching video or Livestreaming.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Software update renders camera useless
customer_reviews.text: Android 7.1.1 update pushed to this device will render the camera useless, as it will not focus at all. Even after providing a serial number, it took 30 minutes to explain to Lenovo customer support that this was a tablet, and not a Windows laptop. Do not purchase until a fix is identified or unless you have no use for the camera, as Lenovo is still painfully unaware of the issue.
customer_reviews.author: GPain

customer_reviews.title: Projector only comes with the tab 3 Pro
customer_reviews.text: At first I was going to return it. I was looking for a cheaper tablet and when I came across this’s one it was at my price point and thought since it was in the description it had the projector, main reason for buying it. You have to get the pro version of it to get the projector. I’m going to keep it because it does well at everything else but kinda upset about how I was miss lead to believe it had a projector. Tab 3 pro is out of my price range.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything I Wanted, and More.
customer_reviews.text: This tablet has exceeded my expectations by far. Lenovo has produced a quality machine that functions as it's intended. The projector is certainly not the most powerful in the world, but for a tablet that does everything I need it to, the projector is a very nice bonus. Battery life: 5 stars Screen quality: 5 stars Design: 5 stars Usablity: 5 stars Projector: 5 stars (for sheer usability and presence) I have NOT been provided with any discount or product in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.
customer_reviews.author: J-S

customer_reviews.title: long battery life and good graphis
customer_reviews.text: This Lonovo tablet is very nice. Sound is good and rotating camera lens is very help for on-line meetings and turning away when not needed. Built in metal kick stand is also very nice for proper screen orientation and hole for hang like a picture frame is also unique and helpful. Can also take a sim card for data only communication off the WIFI.
customer_reviews.author: Joe DeFrank

customer_reviews.title: great battery life
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tablet so my kids could watch videos during a 8-hour flight to/from Europe. The battery life has been great and the sound quality is pretty good. The tablet comes with very few preinstalled bloat apps, so that is a positive. The built-in stand is sturdy, and the kids use it daily. There is not a good way to stand the tablet up in portrait mode, but that has not been much of an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it. I had the older Tab 2 and ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I had the older Tab 2 and you couldn't upgrade the Android version. This has newer Android, much faster, more internal memory and can handle a huge SD card. The picture has better color than the Tab 2. I wasn't able to attach a USB 3 external to the Tab 2 but the Tab 3 works great. I didn't notice that the power and data are now the type C, so I need a few new adapters. I highly recommend it a good value at the price.
customer_reviews.author: Frederic W McClure

customer_reviews.title: I still love it though
customer_reviews.text: It's slow, but you don't buy it because it's top of the line. I took it all over the world and I don't care if someone steals it because it was 150 bucks. Use it for movies and not much else, it doesn't do any heavy lifting processor wise. Even searching google maps for local restaurants kinda overtaxes it. I still love it though.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little piece of equipment for our nonprofit music school
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little piece of equipment for our nonprofit music school. We operate in an office, a church, and a school building, and this tablet means we can show videos or display lesson plans and pictures regardless of the technology capabilities of the facilities. Don't expect the brightest projection--you need to turn the lights off and adjust a lot to get the picture how you want it. That being said, this is a pretty clever machine that makes our lives easier, and as we grow, we plan to purchase more.
customer_reviews.author: Harmony School

customer_reviews.title: Best tablet hands down for 300 to 400 price range
customer_reviews.text: Simply the best sounding tablet i have ever heard , i had samsung tab 3 , Asus zen pad 10inch and both costs more. I really like the stand on the lower back , this way i dont have to buy a cover for it to stay upright and the picuture quality is great also with amazon prime video and netflix and you tube...Simply put , winner for tabs 300 to 400 range. I also see some complaunts about this tab. Well i just recieved it and will update my review about a month from now..
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: I love the hardware and hate the manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: I love the hardware and hate the manufacturer. The hardware is great and with awesome features. But the manufacturer never updated the OS. It is still Android 6, no security updates. In the Lenovo forums people are complaining that the manufacturer does not want to update to the latest Android. Lenovo is done with updates, according to its own site. Would I buy it again, sure. But only because I am capable to update myself using custom ROMs available on the web. I have not yet done it but I am planning to do soon.
customer_reviews.author: L. Perles

customer_reviews.title: Good price, false advertising, ok tablet
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for the advertising of "use any pen". My disappointment is you still need the regular stylus, right on front of the tablet it advertises use any pen what a big fat lie! Defeats my purpose of buying it. The camera depends greatly on external lighting for any type of ok picture. However, the sound is pretty amazing, so its good for watching movies and listening to music.
customer_reviews.author: SweetKisses

customer_reviews.title: Mic and Sound No Longer Works
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item July 24, 2018...it worked great, awesome sound, good quality. By 12/30/18 the sound no longer worked...a very important video of an event that cannot be repeated that I was taking is completely soundless due to the mic also no longer working and I had no idea. I can not voice command anything any longer either. The speakers, which happen to be one of the main selling points of this item also no longer work at all. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Super slow
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this tablet it pretty nice. Except its frustratingly slow out of the box. Hard to enjoy the nice screen and other features when some apps stutter and lag like freakin crazy. But I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: WVU Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great battery life Good sound Solid build Nice screen (although ...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Great battery life Good sound Solid build Nice screen (although not full HD still pretty good) Built-in stand Cons: Performance (not horrible and definitely sufficient for movies, Netflix, Youtube, web browsing and some basic video games) More than 16 GB storage would be nice (but micro SD card slot is avialable and works) Android 6 (yep I know 7 & 8 are now available but then again this is a budget device that has been around for a while, so 6 is still okay) Overall, this is a great tablet for a kid or a senior.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Blazek

customer_reviews.title: Lenovo Hit their stride with this tablet.
customer_reviews.text: I just love this tablet. The speakers blow you away with the quality sound. When listening to videos, movies you get the separate in-bedded sounds like a surround sound, it get you more involved with the movies/videos. The battery life is great. I have no issues on the recharging of this tablet. My tablet was made in March 2018, so they may have made some improvements in the tablet performance as I did not come across the issues raised in prior comments. The kick stand, though small does the job of holding up the tablet. The best tablet I have ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald

customer_reviews.title: So many features for such a small price!
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is amazing. I wouldn't have even thought about purchasing it, but it was the cheapest one on the compatibility list for square panda. I love the built in stand. It is great for reading or watching videos. It also has the best sound quality of any tablet that I have ever owned and I have had many. I have heard that the camera isn't the best. I haven't tried it, but I can't say that the camera feature is of any importance to me! Overall, for the price, this tablet is great, so much more than I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: A. Monahan

customer_reviews.title: Unable to use for air travel
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for air travel which is often. I usually fly Southwest and was unhappy to discover that the Southwest Airlines app is incompatible with this tablet. I can pull Southwest up on my android cell, but not on this android driven product. The tablet is fully updated so there's nothing I can do about this issue. Also, the screen sometimes goes to black while playing games and I have to retype my security number to continue. Overall, it works fine, but very unhappy about the app situation. I would not have purchased this tablet had I known. Android compatible is android compatible and therefore, Lenovo needs to clarify and correct their advertising of this tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Legal Beagle

customer_reviews.title: Overall it's a good pad. Big screen
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace my old ipad 1. Overall it's a good pad. Big screen, integrated bracket, could watch video for 10+ hours before recharging, all perfect for watching anywhere. And won't become useless due to OS updates. The projector isn't really useful for me, have to turn off the lights, and get a white wall with smooth surface. And the power button design isn't very good, it's on the side way where one side is main power another side is projector power, always forget which side is main power. Also the power button can't be pressed down using only one hand, need to hold it to power off.
customer_reviews.author: Cheneau

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tablet to Own
customer_reviews.text: Below are the reasons why this tablet is awesome. 1) Build-quality is superb 2) You will definitely feel the difference of holding this tablet with hands. I would say, the flexible, multi-position stand is biggest plus for this product. 3) Awesome 10.1 inch Quad HD display (2560x1600), even my old 15-inch laptop have just (1336x768). you will never feel disappointed with this display. 4) Supports "screen casting"., see, your tablet screen, on your TV(if it supports casting) via WIFI. 5) Sweet, 4 JBL speakers, dolby atmos enabled front facing speakers. You will definitely, feel the stereo effect with this. 6) Also, can stream songs on mobile to the tab, using bluetooth cast, to take advanntage of those JBL speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy on the eyes
customer_reviews.text: Sized right, even for someone with sausage fingers like me, and I'm using it to run Xair software for a wireless mixing set up. Decided to get the version with more RAM and a better processor and that was one of my better idea's. Holds a charge all night long for the sound gigs I'm using it for. Simply put this was the right tool for the job.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Viel

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of the reviews before purchasing this tablet. I wasn't sure if I would like it or not but thought it was worth a try. Well let me tell you...it is a wonderful tablet! The picture and sound quality is by far the best I have ever had on a tablet. Some reviews mentioned that the video and sound were out of sync, but so far I have not had that issue. The touch screen works wonderfully. I don't have to keep pressing the same spot over and over like I had to do on my other tabs. I'm very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Cherie

customer_reviews.title: Great size and with a built in projector
customer_reviews.text: I own several Android and IOS tablets. For the price and specs this is a winner. Smaller than an iPad Pro but with the projector it is really easy to make impromptu presentations without any cables or extra gear. That is a plus. The only concern is that I’m still trying to find the best pen to take notes with the fastest response. All depends on what you want to use it for. Great for ppt, reading iBooks, web browsing and sharing at home or in the office or classroom images and presentations.
customer_reviews.author: B JE

customer_reviews.title: Best Tablet I have ever used!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this tablet. Beautiful screen quality. I love having an adjustable stand to use. The speakers are a wonderful addition. My five and 7 year old grandsons love watching movies, playing games etc when visiting they beg to use this. The battey life is lengthy and charges quickly. I have always had Samsung tablets prior to this lenovo. I like this one better!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Baird

customer_reviews.title: CPU is super weak
customer_reviews.text: Hardware and sound is great, but the CPU is weak. Everything I run, mundane stuff even, spikes all cores to 100%, causing everything to studder, pause, or run unusually long. Ram is fine, wifi gets max speeds from 2.4ghz, it's the CPU that stinks.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Didn't give 5 cause nothing is perfect, but this thing comes close
customer_reviews.text: Didn't give 5 cause nothing is perfect, but this thing comes close. Expandable storage, stand entire design super cool, great screen, runs fast no lag, battery is insane used it 48 hours on social media while casting netflix to tv listening to soundcloud via wireless connection barely put a dent in battery life. Great platform running the latest android just wish the projector wasn't just on the pro, but there is a big difference from $300 to $1000 so get it.
customer_reviews.author: jchcn9

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing picture quality.
customer_reviews.text: Make sure to update your system prior to watching videos via the "about tablet" option under settings. System update is under that. Netflix wouldn't work before I did that. There is some learning curve but after playing around on it a bit it becomes old hat. The projector reminds me of the old drive ins when I was a kid. Works great in a really dark room. I use this tablet to wind down before bed and makes binge watching much more comfortable. Needs a much longer charging cord though.
customer_reviews.author: Pawkettle

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: So far I love it. I compared it to my friends iPad and it seems to run apps and serf the net just as fast. My friend was take by the size and price compered to his iPad and is now thinking of changing over to Android now. I think that says a lot when a diehard apple user is willing to change after playing with this tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfrider1

customer_reviews.title: No Sim slot!
customer_reviews.text: I received my yoga 3 tab plus months ago. I just recently got a data SIM card, but when I tried to insert SIM card to my tab I was suprised there is no slot for SIM, but the one only for SD card. This point is not descibed in model description which is not fair to costumers. How I should found out that you have 2 type of models one F and another one M. You MUST describe this difference in product description. So, how I can back my tab and change it to M model?
customer_reviews.author: Lars

customer_reviews.title: Just like other reviewers
customer_reviews.text: Just like other reviewers, the Yoga Tab 3 (8 inch) has a manufacturing defect when it comes to charging. The device battery is dead and will no longer hold a charge. It will attempt to charge but never get past 0 percent. The device refuses to boot or get past the splash screen. I attempted a factory reset to no avail. I will be contacting Lenovo for service. This was purchased in December of 2017, it has only been 7 months well within the warranty period.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet for the money
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product so far response is great screen quality is very good touch screen is also very good though it is a little difficult to close or go back a screen as the buttons are very close to the bottom of the screen but it may just be my fat finger because the rest of it works flawlessly. Very good tablet for the money have no problem with games from Google or anything else to this point.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Justice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Do not expect it to run 4k Videos and high CPU usage apps... But if you are into just video streaming 720p videos and happy watching sports, music.. This is good. Battery doesn't work as it is promised.. I can run videos continuously for 3-4 hours and have to put it back on charge. And it takes every to charge while you use the tab. 50-50 satisfaction since it is good but not the best. What you need matters the most. I am happy with streaming videos.
customer_reviews.author: Pavithrasagar

customer_reviews.title: Lenovo Qualcomm Snapdragon beats all competition
customer_reviews.text: The screen size and resolution is excellent. The sound is remarkable. The battery charges fast and lasts all day. Lenovo and Qualcomm have hit it over the fence with operation and features. Snapdragon is very reliable. The tablet is quickly becoming my TV and tool for managing fantasy sports teams. It is my internet access and constant reference source. I cancelled my tablet with my telecommunications company and connect to the world through WIFI. You can't beat the screen touch that is lacking in almost all Microsoft Windows 10 applications for the price.
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tablet, awesome price
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet. Has a unique design, volume is high quality and the screen is awesome. You can hang the tablet or put it in different positions. It's light wait and good size. It's pretty affordable. I love Lenovo products. I really recommend this product 100%
customer_reviews.author: katia barahona

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Only worked for a couple of day it froze to the point where it was useless
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Chavez

customer_reviews.title: BUY Lenovo
customer_reviews.text: The best non apple tablet for response time and great speakers (4) had the earlier model and dropped it breaking the screen but it had been 3 years so hard to find a replacement screen. Tried to save money buying a earlier model Sony xperia but response time and OS are outdated. Very important to make sure your tablet is or will be supported for updates on the OS otherwise hard to use. This tablet and even the one with cracked screen have quick intuitive build and touch. Can't say enough good about Lenovo tablets. BTW the earlier model I purchased went up in price! how does that happen, except its a great product and in demand.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy R

customer_reviews.title: Awesome budget or midrange tablet.  Nice quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for working on my Audi. Never thought I’d use it daily. I do! It does light gaming ok, and plays videos like a champ. I love it. Nice build quality. Great price. I’m an Apple person but after a painful week I now like Android as well. Just have to learn it. I recommend this. It’s a quality build with great display, and battery life. Camera is just OK. BTW. the sound on this tablet is incredible. Dolby Atmos sounds better than I thought a tablet could ever sound. Better than most laptops.
customer_reviews.author: RYAN MACEWEN PRUYN

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this tablet. I say loved because after a road trip I was unpacking the car and it was on something I grabbed. It fell right on the concrete on the corner. I decided to get the Lenovo yoga book and I have used it once. I loved this one so much more.
customer_reviews.author: Kasandra Reuter

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is not that good...
customer_reviews.text: My flatmate got the same tab which he bought from a showroom and his dolby surround sound is extremely amazing compared to mine... My speakers were supposed to be Dolby but sounds like a normal speaker... Well the tab works fine though... Next time its better to buy electronics in a showroom so that you can test if its working fine.....
customer_reviews.author: Ivan A.

customer_reviews.title: A hot wife with a terrible personality
customer_reviews.text: Just as the headline says, beautiful to look at but the OS is outdated Android 6.0 so you'll be doing nothing considering it's 2019. Lenovo's already said no further updates for this model so you'll be stuck with all the dinosaurs. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great mid-priced tablet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one to replace my Fire HD because I couldn't watch in-flight tv when on American or YouTube. I love this tablet & haven't had any issues with being able to use any apps. I also didn't want to spend a ton of money on a high dollar one that basically does the same thing. If you aren't hung up on brand names, you'll love this tablet. It's dependable & great to take on the road. I love the kickstand & recommend getting the cover made for this feature. Has good audio as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jkt

customer_reviews.title: projector is gimmicky, low resolution dim and practically unusable.
customer_reviews.text: Too heavy. I am ipad user and was surprised to notice the apps don't have optimized text displays. Wastes too much space, small text. Don't by big tablets for androids. Stick to smaller ones. Even after developing android for so many years google is no where near user experience of Ipad users.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: So far this piece of equipment is wonderful!. They really did a 👍 job when they created the Yoga Tab. the Dolby sound quality is Excellent compared to ALL the other tablets I've tested in the past. Works best for a musician trying to learn a new instrument. I Like the extra built in stand as well. And NOW ~ The Glitches have Gotten Quite WORSE & More. Frequent!!! I was taking an online course & the tablet shut my page down THREE TIMES. On Different topics!#!# Yeah~ This was Unexpected! I just didn't think it would escalate to this degree so quickly. Too bad 4 me!!!
customer_reviews.author: Serena Barkley

customer_reviews.title: Great price! Easy to setup and serve my needs
customer_reviews.text: I received this tablet very quickly. It is very easy to setup for an Apple user. This is my first android device. I have been watching youtube and Netflix and have no issue. It is not lightning fast but fast enough for my use. I can now watch youtube tutorial and still listen to songs on my phone. I highly recommend this tablet. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Fujihobo

customer_reviews.title: Lenovo Yoga Tab 3 "HD" 8"  only 720p
customer_reviews.text: Loving this Unit. Last forever, great responsiveness. One thing to note is the screen resolution. Advertisement notes HD screen quality, didnt realize it is hard locked to 720p. Youtube wont let you go higher than 720, however all in all im very happy with my purchase. Will be buying the projector model at some point in the near future as a camp media device!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Kiehn

customer_reviews.title: Was good...
customer_reviews.text: I got this in April and now in July it started to malfunction. Turned off on it’s own and froze multiple times. then It was dropped and the normal one year warranty didn’t cover that. So if you do get this.... pay for extra coverage or don’t get it all together.
customer_reviews.author: tony diorio

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL SPEAKERS, GORGEOUS SCREEN!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic screen, battery lasts and lasts, super fast charging, and excellent speakers. This tablet is even better than I thought it would be. Qualcomm is the best, and even though the chip in this tablet isn't as fast as my Pixel 2 XL, it's still very fast. I haven't found anything I don't like. It upgraded immediately to Android 6 with no issues whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Wickiup

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tablet
customer_reviews.text: Overall I'm very happy with this tablet! The battery life is amazing, I've gotten about 13 hours of almost continuous use playing games. The speed is great. I did add a 128 microsd to up the internal storage which I'm thankful for because this machine isn't great on built in storage. I love the stand! It stays where you put it very well and adds to the functionality without having to buy a stand. The power button on the end is a little annoying but very easily fixed by flipping the tablet over and holding the other side. I've only had it about 2 weeks so I can't speak to the long term yet but for now, I love it
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Emrich

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK WITH AUX CABLE
customer_reviews.text: If you take an auxiliary cable (3.5 mm male to male) and connect it to the tablet and connect the other end to a powered speaker, the tablet will not switch to the AUX cable. Music will play over the tablet's speakers instead. Seems the only thing it will let you connect is a headset or headphone. Had to return the unit.
customer_reviews.author: YellowBeastMode

customer_reviews.title: Serious Android cool
customer_reviews.text: I can't understate how cool the stand is, this is just a brilliant design, the tablet itself is, slickly laid out, fast and holds a charge like a champ. And how about a tablet you don't need headphones or a BT speaker to hear. I have had a Lenovo laptop for ages and this company puts out quality products without a lot of fuss. If you're not caught up with the Apple allure, this tablet packs a lot of bang for the buck and looks good doing it too.
customer_reviews.author: Boo

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: Really good performance, looks and feels great, size is just right, the stand included is really convenient, good for reading, REALLY good battery life. Recommend this for anyone on a budget of umder 200$
customer_reviews.author: Juan Magnani

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as it sounds
customer_reviews.text: This has been a very aggravating tablet. It has terrible battery life. It may work for several hours when not on the charger but it dies in stand by. My previous Samsung would go weeks in stand by without charging. My old ipad can go three times longer. It has a quick when viewing Facebook. If I touch a picture the screen goes from landscape to portrait and won't go back until I close Facebook. The best feature is the sound and grahics. They are indeed awesome. I still prefer my three year old Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Center

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my art demonstrations and online classes
customer_reviews.text: I'm so sad Lenovo isn't continuing to make these because they are wonderful! The images are bright and crisp, even for Zoom sessions. The projector and speakers work great for my in-person classes, where there's no budget for a smart board or projector. It does a great job replacing my Chromebook that died after 4 faithful years, and it does so much more!
customer_reviews.author: Artist, Wife, & Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: So far so good used for a few days now
customer_reviews.text: So far so good used for a few days now, great sound really great sound ,good design, have not tried projector yet ,snappy,good picture on screen,well worth for the front fire speakers ,after using for a few months i feel the battery takes long time to charge looking at it right now at 11 percent it says it will take 23 hrs to complete , maybe it defective i will return.
customer_reviews.author: paul h

customer_reviews.title: A good buy for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: I use this to control my Harmony Hub which controls my smart TV. They all get along very well together. The battery life is excellent. Only one negative, the touch screen is very sensitive. To sensitive, I'm pretty sure I can push a button just by staring at it. I found that it responds to my Apple pencil so I use it a lot. It would be nice to have a 5Ghz radio. 2.4Ghz is very crowded in my neighborhood.
customer_reviews.author: J. P. Price

customer_reviews.title: Love This Tablet
customer_reviews.text: I've had many other tablets. I really like this one. The battery life is fantastic. Movies are beautiful. I like the rotating camera. My kid Skypes his mother and the resolution and picture are great. Sound is pretty good for the little speakers. I would recommend this to most.
customer_reviews.author: Fixed Gear

customer_reviews.title: Cannot get updates
customer_reviews.text: Cannot update beyond 6.0 and as such cannot use many apps. It works well, but just not all apps will work.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Johns

customer_reviews.title: Working nearly perfect tablet. The touch-screen is not sensitive when using
customer_reviews.text: Working nearly perfect tablet. The touch-screen is not sensitive when using. I am very happy with Lenovo Yoga Tab 3 Pro 64GB version.
customer_reviews.author: THANH C.

customer_reviews.title: The best tablet!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this tablet! The sound from the speaker in the tablet is clear, robust and can get pretty loud! Also, the vibrant resolution of the screen is breath taking and beautiful. It is super quick and really easy to use! I highly recommend this tablet!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie06291989

customer_reviews.title: Great price, Amazing gadget
customer_reviews.text: I am a tech nut. This tablet is grrreat. It gives me the battery time I need, the audio is good. The projector is a godsend. Been using this over a month now, and with full projection for over 2 hours, still had well over 50% battery. It's light. I recommend getting a screen cover and a cover for it. It's very light, but you want to protect it and the moving parts from any damage. Happy as, good connectivity and performance all round. Projector, crisp, with the kids, magic.
customer_reviews.author: Faruq Hasan

customer_reviews.title: love it Lenovo yoga tab 3 8" wifi only version, came with android 6
customer_reviews.text: Lenovo yoga tab 3 8" wifi only model yt3-850f; so glad i made the purchase; love it, came with android 6; 2gb ram, 16gb storage; dont know why others are giving negative reviews; love the dual speakers, very loud and clear. also the anypen touch screen is awesome
customer_reviews.author: Prime Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing device for media use
customer_reviews.text: This device is awesome. While I expected the projector to be more of gimmick, it truly changes how you use a tablet. My purpose for this device is to watch Moves and TV while traveling. The sd card allows for a extra storage. The tablet is of good quality, works as expected and functions great. The projector allows you to play content on almost any smooth surface (the lighter the color the better). In some hotels, the windows shades are perfect for projecting onto. The projector requires a darkened room.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: It's worth maybe $100. Picture quality is terrible. I have had mine for about a year and twice now I have had to do a factory reset because it suddenly starts skipping through media, as if the fast forward button keeps getting pushed. Screen clarity is not very good. I guess it's still kinda better than the fire I was trying to decide between. Also, you get what you pay for. I recommend saving up for better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Royce

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tablet - excellent display and great battery life.
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is an excellent Android tablet. The screen is really nice and the round part on one side makes the tablet easy to hold. The performance is good and this will become my current best tablet of the several I own. The battery life so far seems rather amazing. I've had the tablet 3 days and it still seems to have almost its full charge. This is a pleasant surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Geezer Geek

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE.
customer_reviews.text: People, this is running Android 5. Google that and shiver. Also, WiFi sounds good, but when you find out it only connects to 2.4GHz antennas, you'll realize that your very very old 3G phones (that aren't even made anymore) was faster than this. It does not connect to 5G WiFi. Kiss watching videos out the door. Even images took minutes to load, MINUTES! I returned in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: ODash

customer_reviews.title: Lenovo. Yoga tab 3 plus
customer_reviews.text: In one word "WOW"; this tab is fast; in fact this is the fastest computer (tab) i ever owned. Down loaded and installed a handful of apps from play store upon my receiving my tab from Amazon so fast i was wowed. Also i was listening to my micro card music and surfing the internet while installing playstore apps. You must try this lenovo yoga tab 3 plus to appreciate this quality tab. I highly recommend this device to all new tab shoppers.
customer_reviews.author: Michael. G. Mesa

customer_reviews.title: so far so good!
customer_reviews.text: even though I read so many bad reviews for this tablet, I still decided to purchase it at risk, because it's so Cool to have the projector built in your tablet——it's just what I want for the tablet——the entertainment from watching videos, movies and tv shows and listening to music. Luckily, for almost 3 months, it's working well. So far So good. However, of course the battery wouldn't last 18 hours while using it and camera really sucks. But there is no PERFECT electronic device yet, and Iove the projector! plus, The stander is Super convenient !
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's Different, which is what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Tablets are so blah lately with them made from cheap plastic and cheaper processors. Its hard to find a nice handheld tablet that is fast and looks good. This tablet has great sound. Graphics pretty good and the build is better than average.
customer_reviews.author: Power Wheelz - Custom Wheelchair

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy Lenovo products.  Lenovo doesn't update software
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this or any other Lenovo product. As listed in the specs this is a 3yr old tablet and comes with outdated android 5/6. Most apps don't work or won't work correctly anymore. Lenovo hasn't upgraded software for over 2 yrs and doesn't plan to even after customer complaints.
